Package index

All functions

clean()
Remove all artifacts generated by scripts
display_scripts_table_targets()
Display the scripts table using targets backend
external_in()
Mark a file as external input to the script
file_in()
Mark a file as input to the script
file_out()
Mark a file as output from the script
generate_targets_file()
Generate _targets.R file from bakepipe scripts
root()
Find project root directory
run()
Run pipeline
scripts()
Find all R scripts in project
status()
Show pipeline status
